text:
Q: Undefined property when trying to access column not mentioned in CodeIgniter query's SELECT clause A:

Try to remove 

$this->db->select("regID,loginCode");

In your model to see what's happening

Q: DFS Namespace - The RPC server is unavailable A:

You can remove orphaned namespace server by:

  • going to DFS Management
  • Namespaces
  • add your namespace to display and click on it
  • go to Namespace Server tab
  • remove orphaned namespace server

Q: This SVC instance is not fitted yet. Call 'fit' with appropriate arguments before using this method A:

In the 2nd last line it is :

classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)

and not

classifier.fit = (X_train, y_train)

Q: Higlight/disable specific dates in ajax calendar control based on database selection A:

I think you can do that using Calandar control and PopupControl Extender. You can do all you do to Calendar control and it's act like Calendar Extender. check this link also.

Q: (rsErrorOpeningConnection) Could not obtain information about Windows NT group/user A:

Try unchecking “Impersonate the authenticated user after a connection has been made to the data source.”
